DataElement.preferredName: Breast Negative Surgical Margin Other Spatial Relationship To Patient Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: User entered text describing anatomic relationship of the negative breast margin to the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Negative Surgical Margin Other Patient Orientation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:definition pending_Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:definition pending

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
Indicates the absence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.

A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.
